body:
Create Table dbo.Tmp_Rn_$TableName$(
	TmpId Int Identity(1,1) NOT NULL,
	$ColumnName$Id int NOT NULL,
	HostName nvarchar(max) NOT NULL,
	AddDate DateTime Not Null Default(GETDATE()),
	AddUser Int Not Null,
	UpdateDate DateTime Null,
	UpdateUser Int  Null
	Constraint Pk_Rn_$TableName$             
        Primary Key Clustered (TmpId Desc)
) On [PRIMARY];
Go

Create View Tmpv_Rn_$TableName$
--WITH ENCRYPTION, SCHEMABINDING, VIEW_METADATA
AS
    Select * From dbo.Tmp_Rn_$TableName$
    --joinli hali
-- WITH CHECK OPTION
GO
